content: 2 stitches until row 60 row 61 slip 1 k2tog psso bind off squares 3 & 4 knit in exactly the same way as square 2 for changes of colour please refer to the chart above squares 5 9 & 13 pick up 30 stitches along the side of square 1 5 & 9 & cast on 31 stitches knit as previous squares from row 2 onwards squares 6 7 8 10 11 12 14 15 & 16 with the appropriate colour pick up 30 stitches along the edge of the adjacent square and then pick up 31 stitches along the bottom edge of the square above count this as row 1 knit as previous squares from row 2 onwards border with colour a pick up 120 stitches along 1 side of the blanket knit 6 row in garter stitch bind off with colour a pick up 120 stitches along the opposite side of the blanket knit 6 row in garter stitch bind off with colour b pick up 132 stitches along the top edge of the blanket knit 6 row in garter stitch bind off with colour b pick up 132 stitches along the bottom edge of the blanket knit 6 row in garter stitch bind off finishing weave in all ends this may take a while but it will be worth it
